reviewText: A series that is good and funny.
I like watching these episodes.  It is a nice story that I'm looking forward to watching the rest when I can get them.  But these are in that category as well.

There is subtle hints of yaoi throughout the series.  If you love a good monarchy, then this series is for you. There is tons of action and magic, but it also has a great story line.  Well worth adding to your collection!

This series is awsome! Yuri(main character)is teleported to another world through water. He becomes the new demon king and gets engaged to another guy named Wolfrom (who's a demon), on acciedent! All sorts of stuff happens to him. Sometimes you feel sorry for him, or just embarrassed! But mostly you'll fall out of your seat laughing your head off! I recommend getting this series! I give it 5 stars!
There are TWO editions of Volume 4 of Kyo Kara Maou. Please note that this version is the DVD with the Art Box, NOT the single DVD edition.
There are TWO editions of Volume 4 of Kyo Kara Maou. Please note that this version is the single edition, and does NOT come with the Art Box.

If you like alice in wonderland you will love this. I can not wait for the box sets to come out Yuri keeps getting in over his head like ... and ... I love it. I have seen the first season in Japanese. The switching back and forth doesn't happen as often. It's a little racey(if you think you're kids shouldn't watch Harry Poter than this isn't for your family) but what anime isn't? If based on American standards it should be 17 and up due to the gay related situations but if you ask me I would let my kids watch Kyo kara moah at the age of 13ish.
